programme.desc: For Sophia's birthday, Dorothy flies her sister Angela in from Sicily, Italy, as a surprise; however, Dorothy's the one who's surprised when Sophia's reaction is that of disgust.

programme.desc: Dorothy feels sympathy for Stan when he tells her he's going to have open heart surgery; however, that sympathy fades when she learns of his many infidelities while they were married.

programme.desc: After the family makes fun of Reba's poor eyesight, she secretly gets laser eye surgery, which leaves her temporarily blind.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: A court-mandated anger-management session goes from bad to worse for Reba, Brock, Van and Cheyenne when Barbara Jean joins the fray.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: A physical reveals that Reba has high blood pressure; Van asks for Brock's advice on anniversary gifts.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Barbra Jean overwhelm Cheyenne with advice when she plans her second wedding to Van; Cheyenne tries to call off the wedding.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba is rushed to the hospital after collapsing at Van and Cheyenne's non-wedding; Van and Cheyenne question their marriage.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean shows off her new sleek figure and staunch dedication to the gym, which Brock fears is about spending time with her male trainer.

programme.title: The Magic of Ordinary Days
programme.desc: During World War II, the father of an unwed mother (Keri Russell) marries her off to a farmer (Skeet Ulrich) who will raise her baby as his own.

programme.title: Love in Store
programme.desc: Two rival shopping hosts are forced together while competing for a promotion and find that their on-air chemistry kindles an off-air spark.

programme.title: Falling in Love in Niagara
programme.desc: When her fiance leaves her right before the wedding, Madeline goes to Niagara Falls to honeymoon without him. She soon finds new love while reconnecting with her adventurous side.

programme.title: A Greek Recipe for Romance
programme.desc: While visiting her mother in Greece, Abby decides to open a restaurant with a man she just met.

programme.title: An Unexpected Valentine
programme.desc: A chance encounter on Valentine's Day brings Hannah and Finn together as they race through New York City to return a lost engagement ring and save one couple's special day.

programme.desc: Cora, a new police detective, is partnered with visiting detective Liam on her first case; little does she know that Liam is her reincarnated love who's here to change her fate.

programme.title: Aurora Teagarden Mysteries: Death at the Diner
programme.desc: When the owner of the diner where Aurora Teagarden works is suddenly killed, her new boyfriend becomes the primary suspect.

programme.desc: A woodworking artisan in a French seaside town dreams of restoring a local lighthouse, but an American architect may derail her plans.

programme.desc: Houston's premier real estate agent contacts Reba and Van for a meeting, exciting Reba but concerning Van that he will be her assistant.

programme.desc: One of Dorothy's pupils may face deportation, and she feels responsible.

programme.desc: Blanche announces that she is canceling a date with her latest boyfriend, because he does not meet her standards.

programme.desc: Dorothy dismays when her daughter is too forgiving of her unfaithful husband.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: When two police officers set up surveillance equipment in Blanche's house, Dorothy, Rose, Blanche and Sophia are more interested in snaring the policemen.

programme.title: Snowkissed
programme.desc: A travel-averse journalist chases her dream assignment, and she unwillingly finds herself mentoring a handsome B&B owner who wants to be a tour guide.

programme.title: A Dash of Love
programme.desc: When an aspiring chef lands a dream job at her idol's restaurant, she befriends the handsome executive chef. After they are wrongly fired, the duo open their own eatery to prove their food is better.

programme.title: A Little Daytime Drama
programme.desc: Hoping to save her daytime soap opera, a writer tries to convince a popular actress and her real-life boyfriend to return to the show.

programme.title: Winter Love Story
programme.desc: When author Cassie's first novel isn't selling, she is paired on a book tour with author Elliot to boost her sales, but along the way, a romance starts to blossom.

programme.title: Where Your Heart Belongs
programme.desc: When a marketing executive returns home to help with her best friend's wedding, she learns the hard way that love and support from family and friends means more than she'd ever imagined.

programme.title: A Country Wedding
programme.desc: Sparks fly when an engaged country-music star (Jesse Metcalfe) reconnects with a childhood friend (Autumn Reeser).
